title: Key Question in Oath Keepers Sedition Trial: Was There a Plan on Jan. 6?
description: The defendants from the far-right militia group are arguing that their participation in the storming of the Capitol was spontaneous rather than the product of a conspiracy.
dc:creator: Alan Feuer

media:content.media:credit: Kenny Holston for The New York Times
media:content.media:description: Many members of the Oath Keepers joined in the attack on the Capitol, but some say it was not part of a premeditated plan.
